key.name: deco-type
key.description: Can be '' (automatic), 'hg' (GNOME headerbar), 'he' (elementary OS headerbar), 'm' (menubar only), 'mtc' (menubar and toolbar, colorful icons), 'mts' (menubar and toolbar, symbolic icons), 'tc' (toolbar only, colorful icons), or 'ts' (toolbar only, symbolic icons).

key.name: big-icons
key.description: Use 24px symbolic icons instead of 16px. It's an accessibility feature which is off by default because it can make icons blurry.

key.name: ctrl-zoom
key.description: User can zoom with scrolling or ctrl+scrolling.

key.name: disabled-tools
key.description: A list of optional tools' id to disable.

key.name: preview-size
key.description: Size of the bigger dimension of the preview (px).

key.name: replace-alpha
key.summary: What will replace transparent pixels if needed
key.description: What will replace transparent pixels when saving to a file format not supporting it, such as JPG or BMP. It can be 'white', 'black', 'ask' (the value isn't memorized and a dialog is prompted each time), 'nothing' (the alpha channel is removed, which usually replace deleted areas with black but preserves semi-transparent colors' saturation), 'checkboard', or 'initial' (the initial color of an image).

key.name: ui-background-rgba
key.description: The color for the background of the user interface, behind the image.

key.name: devel-only
key.description: Turn on devel features (not recommended).

key.name: dark-theme-variant
key.summary: If the app prefers the dark theme variant
key.description: This setting impacts the related boolean setting from GTK, but doesn't change the actual theme. So if the global theme is already dark, it has no effect.

key.name: default-rgba
key.description: The default color background of a new image.

key.name: default-width
key.description: Default width of a new image (px).

key.name: default-height
key.description: Default height of a new image (px).

key.name: maximized
key.description: The state of the last closed window.

key.name: show-labels
key.description: Visibility of tools' labels in the side pane. If false, tools are displayed in a flowbox (several icons per line if not enough height).

key.name: last-active-tool
key.description: The id of the last active tool, saved when closing a window.

key.name: direct-color-edit
key.description: If a click on the color button should display directly the complete color selector.

key.name: last-version
key.description: The last version of the app that the user has started. If the string doesn't correspond to the running version of the app, a dialog is shown to tell the user to read the release notes.

key.name: last-right-rgba
key.description: The last edition color for the right click, saved when closing a window.

key.name: last-left-rgba
key.description: The last edition color for the left click, saved when closing a window.

key.name: last-size
key.description: The last tool size (px), saved when closing a window.

key.name: last-active-shape
key.description: The id of the last active shape from the "shape" tool, saved when closing a window.

key.name: last-shape-filling
key.description: The name of the last active shape filling style from the "shape" tool, saved when closing a window.

key.name: last-font-name
key.description: The name of the last active font family, from the "text" tool, saved when closing a window.

key.name: last-text-background
key.description: The name of the last active background style, from the "text" tool, saved when closing a window.

key.name: use-antialiasing
key.description: The default value of the 'antialiasing' boolean option, for any compatible tools.

key.name: last-delete-replace
key.summary: Type of color left behind by a deletion
key.description: A deletion is any use of the solid eraser, or any area under a selection that will be moved, cut, or deleted. Values can be 'alpha' (transparency), 'initial' (the initial color of the canvas), or 'secondary' (the color of the right-click).
